about_the_game:
How would you feel being trapped on the moon while everyone and everything trying to kill you, knowing there's no hope for you?

How would you feel if your only friend betrayed you?



Try not to die while exploring secret facility located on moon.
Solve various tests using experimental technology while trying to escape.



Don't loose all hope. Someone is still beliving in you.

Features:
  • Singleplayer - Story Mode
  • Physics based puzzles
  • Microphone usage
  • Modding support
detailed_description:
How would you feel being trapped on the moon while everyone and everything trying to kill you, knowing there's no hope for you?

How would you feel if your only friend betrayed you?



Try not to die while exploring secret facility located on moon.
Solve various tests using experimental technology while trying to escape.



Don't loose all hope. Someone is still beliving in you.

name: True Abstraction: Rewind - Demo (Windows)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel core i5 3570
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 860M
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: It is recommended to install on a SSD but HDD should still work.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 10400f
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: It is recommended to install on a SSD but HDD should still work.

short_description: You'll need to solve chambers in the secret moon facility. But be careful because something is trying to kill you without thinking. Nobody will cry about your death.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Polish
*languages with full audio support
